Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near Commercial/90th
ShortDescription: SB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 90th, Houston, 92nd, & Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 90th, Houston, 92nd, & Commercial, due to street blockage near Commercial/90th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
